content: Investments PFF Panel 3 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019Which Singapore RSP is the most user-friendly? I am using DBSâ€™ Nikko AM STI RSP and it does not have a comprehensive view of what I have invested, the dividends I have received etc.It only shows market value + units i currently hold.1 answerAnswerBump1

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 04 Mar 2019Every month you should receive a letter of how many units were bought and the fees.And whenever the dividend is given, you should also recieve a letter to inform you how much dividend per share and total dividends you received.For other information regarding the ETF, you have to check it out online https://www.nikkoam.com.sg/etf/stiI am not vested with the other banks RSP but I believe they are the same0 comments0
